name: Second Brain OS
description: Second Brain OSManage your life using the PARA methodOur brains are for thinking, not for holding or managing informationHow to download the template?Pay what you think is fair (or enter "0" to get it for free!)Continue with the checkout process and add your emailYou'll receive an email containing the link and be redirected to the product pageBefore you click on the template link make sure to give this product a ratingOpen the Notion link and click duplicate in the top right corner and enjoy!
